params.maximumPayoutAmount: The maximum amount of tokens the Bounty will pay out upon being claimed
params.minimumPayoutAmount: The minimum amount of tokens the Bounty will pay out upon being claimed

params.contributors: The contributor information for the Claim

collectPaymentOrders().details: Marks the orders as completed for the client.      The responsibility to fulfill the orders are now in the caller's      hand!

returns._1: total amount of token to pay

params.bountyId: The id of the Bounty to return.

params.claimId: The id of the Claim to return.

identifier().details: The identifier is defined as the keccak256 hash of the module's      abi packed encoded major version, url and title.

init(address,(uint256,uint256,string,str.details: CAN be overriden by downstream contract.MUST call `__Module_init()`.

params.configData: Variable config data for specific module                   implementations.

params.bountyId: The id of the Bounty to test.

returns._0: True if Claim with id `id` exists, false otherwise.

params.claimId: The id of the Bounty to test.

returns._0: True if Claim with id `id` exists, false otherwise.

listClaimIdsForContributorAddress(addres.details: List is in ascending order.Returns an empty .

params.contributorAddrs: claim ids are filtered by the contributor address

lockBounty(uint256).details: Only callable by authorized addresses.Reverts if id invalid.

params.bountyId: The id of the Bounty that will be locked.
The id of the Bounty that will be updated.

params.claimId: The id of the Claim that will be updated.
params.contributors: The contributor information for the Claim.

params.claimId: The id of the Claim that will be updated.

verifyClaim(uint256,(address,uint256)[]).details: Only callable by authorized addresses.Reverts if id invalid.contributors should be copied out of the given Claim. The parameter is used to prevent front running.

params.claimId: The id of the Claim that wants to claim the Bounty.
params.contributors: The contributor information for the Claim.

getBountyInformation(uint256).notice: Returns the Bounty instance with id `id`.

getClaimInformation(uint256).notice: Returns the Claim instance with id `id`.

isExistingBountyId(uint256).notice: Returns whether Bounty with id `id` exists.

isExistingClaimId(uint256).notice: Returns whether Claim with id `id` exists.

listBountyIds().notice: Returns total list of Bounty ids.

listClaimIds().notice: Returns total list of Claim ids.

listClaimIdsForContributorAddress(addres.notice: Returns a list of Claim ids in which contributor Address is used.

lockBounty(uint256).notice: Locks the Bounty so it cant be claimed.

outstandingTokenAmount().notice: Returns the total outstanding token payment amount.

paymentOrders().notice: Returns the list of outstanding payment orders.

verifyClaim(uint256,(address,uint256)[]).notice: Completes a Bounty by verifying a claim.
